Row.Text: This is a good omen.
+100 [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age Points, scaling with Era.
Our gods favor us.
+1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness in all Cities for 30 turns.
Our priests believe this to be a positive sign.
50% chance to gain 250 [ICON_PEACE] Faith, scaling with Era.
Our observatories are going to learn a lot from this.
+500 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science.
Break it up and send it to the Forge.
50% chance to gain 2 [ICON_RES_IRON] Iron.
Divide it up amongst our Shrines.
+1 [ICON_PEACE] Faith in all Shrines.
Put it next to my throne.
+2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture from Palace.
Donate it to the universities.
+1 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science from all Universities.
It belongs in a Museum.
+1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture from all Museums.
I'm not sure what this means.
Gain +100 [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age Points. 25% chance to lose 250 [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age Points. Values scale with Era.
Quick, make a sacrifice!
-50 [ICON_FOOD] Food in [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital, +50 [ICON_PEACE] Faith. Values scale with Era.
Science can explain this!
+250 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science, scaling with Era..
Quick, take a picture!
+500 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture, scaling with Era..
Subsidize the farms.
Lose 500 [ICON_GOLD] Gold, scaling with Era. You are confident that you can avoid a drought.
Set aside some emergency funds.
Lose 250 [ICON_GOLD] Gold, scaling with Era. You are hopeful that you can avoid a drought.
Send money to local officials.
Lose 100 [ICON_GOLD] Gold, scaling with Era. You are unsure that you can avoid a drought.
Grin and bear it. There's nothing we can do.
You are worried about a potential drought.
People should stay indoors, even if that means less commerce.
-2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold in all Cities for 50 turns.
Take fuel from our industries and distribute it to the poor and needy.
-2 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production in all Cities for 50 turns.
Trains and steam power make us immune to the cold.
No negative effect.
Let them eat cake.
2 Barbarians spawn near all owned Cities. 5 turns of [ICON_RESISTANCE] Unrest in all Cities.
Use our City-State connections to find common ground.
3 turns of [ICON_RESISTANCE] Unrest in all Cities.
We are all brothers and sisters of progress, are we not?
1 Barbarian spawns near every owned City, 2 turns of [ICON_RESISTANCE] Unrest in all Cities.
Find the leader and bribe him off.
Lose 1000 [ICON_GOLD] Gold, scaling with Era.
Rally the martial spirit of our people.
All valid units gain the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Morale[ENDCOLOR] Promotion. +5 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness for 30 turns.
Channel the energy into our industries.
+3 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production in all Cities.
The New World Order begins now!
10 turns of 'We Love the King Day' in all Cities. Military Academies produce +5 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science for 30 turns.
For the Motherland!
Factories grant Cities +10% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production for 30 turns.
Buy Victory Bonds!
Banks grant Cities +20% [ICON_GOLD] Gold for 30 turns.
Give a speech at our Palace.
75% chance that all Cities will produce -1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness.
Have our religious leader pray for the wounded and deceased.
-250 [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age Points, scaling with Era.
Give a radio broadcast to the nation.
25% chance that all Cities will produce -2 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness.
We must win. Begin conscription.
50% chance that all Cities will produce a Great War Infantry and experience 2 turns of [ICON_RESISTANCE] Resistance.
Comet sighted!
A comet has appeared in our night sky. What does this mean?
Eclipse!
Our people were surprised to witness an eclipse today. What does this mean for our empire?
Heat wave!
Every summer seems hotter than the last, and our lakes and rivers are drying up. Soon, a drought may be upon us. What should we do?
Ice age!
A sudden drop in average temperatures can only mean one thing: a small ice age! How should we prepare?
A meteor has landed!
With a bright flash of light and a huge crash, a meteor has landed in our territory. What should we do with it?
Revolution!
To arms! Dissident civilians from across our empire have risen up to contest your rule! What will you do?
War fervor!
Your people clamor for war! Our martial spirit is high, and your military advisor wishes to know how you would like to channel this energy.
War weariness!
The toll of war is hard on our people. They seek solace in the face of destruction and defeat, and look to you for guidance. How will you respond?
